entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
